scripts.postinstall: cp -n envs/.env.local .env; npx prisma generate; npm run migrate:init;
scripts.docker:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && echo WAIT... && sleep 2
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run docker:up && cross-env DATABASE_URL=postgresql://admin:admin@localhost:5434/brain-ag-db-test npm run migrate:init && cross-env DATABASE_URL=postgresql://admin:admin@localhost:5434/brain-ag-db-test jest -i --passWithNoTests --detectOpenHandles --forceExit && npm run docker:down
